Array.name: Sleeping Land at the Beginning of the Dawn Forest
Array.description: It's a place that envelops the area around the ground that still retains its vitality.

Array.name: Left Behind Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place where a promise of someday remains.

Array.name: Sleeping Land with Only Traces Left
Array.description: It's a place where traces of revisiting the past remain.

Array.name: Sleeping Land Where a Miracle Descended
Array.description: It's a place where a warm miracle descended.

Array.name: Sleeping Land Where a Rock Sleeps
Array.description: A large stone where a fairy used to stay remains alone.

Array.name: Roughened Sleeping Land
Array.description: It was a plentiful place, but now it has become rough.

Array.name: Echo's Sleeping Land
Array.description: Someone's voice is echoing lonely.

Array.name: Sleeping Land Where Fantasy Descended
Array.description: If you walk softly, a beautiful illusion flickers.

Array.name: Land Where Expectations Sleep
Array.description: It's a place where the expectation of awakening anew sleeps.

Array.name: Land Where Wind Sleeps
Array.description: The wind is brushing against the withered branches.

Array.name: Wandering Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place where you end up wandering if you step in when the fog is thick.

Array.name: Land Where History Sleeps
Array.description: It's a place where a history everyone has forgotten is asleep.

Array.name: Chilling Land
Array.description: It seems like a cold aura is around.

Array.name: Foggy Sleeping Land
Array.description: It seems like the fog has seeped deep into the ground.

Array.name: Dreaming Sleeping Land
Array.description: They say that if you fall asleep here, it's not easy to wake up.

Array.name: Withering Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place where all the vibrant plants have withered away.

Array.name: Quietly Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a quiet place where no sound can be heard.

Array.name: Forgotten Sleeping Land
Array.description: There are traces of something important, but it's unclear now.

Array.name: Unknown Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's an unknown place where nothing has been recorded.

Array.name: Wind-Whispering Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place where you can hear a strange wind sound that's strong enough to shake your body.

Array.name: Mysterious Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place that conceals a secret.

Array.name: Shadowy Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place where you can't see the sun.

Array.name: Confused Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place entangled with the confusion of wandering creatures.

Array.name: Drifting Sleeping Land
Array.description: You end up circling the same place over and over.

Array.name: Shadow-Cloaked Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place covered in dark shadows.

Array.name: Waiting Sleeping Land
Array.description: This land will wait until you come to find it.

Array.name: Secret-Holding Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's where a heart that was never shared with anyone rests.

Array.name: Puzzling Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place entwined with matters that were a mystery to everyone.

Array.name: Stagnant Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place where it seems like time has stopped.

Array.name: Disaster-Stricken Land
Array.description: It's a place that has experienced an unavoidable disaster.

Array.name: Land Where Faithfulness Sleeps
Array.description: The heart towards the divine has fallen asleep with the green plants.

Array.name: Sun-Deprived Sleeping Land
Array.description: The twinkling sunlight is no longer visible.

Array.name: Broken Branch's Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place where the golden branches have broken and disappeared.

Array.name: Thorn Bush's Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place where sharp thorny bushes block the path.

Array.name: Labyrinth's Sleeping Land
Array.description: There's a maze that leads to an unknown place.

Array.name: Cursed Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a place cursed by someone unknown.

Array.name: Black Thorn's Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a dangerous place where black thorns are hidden.

Array.name: Land Where the Stars Sleep
Array.description: It's a deep forest where even the starlight doesn't reach.

Array.name: Black Feather's Sleeping Land
Array.description: It's a deep, dark forest where even the starlight doesn't reach.

Array.name: Land Where Precious Sleeps
Array.description: It's a place where someone's cherished thing has fallen asleep.

Array.name: Frozen Treasure Chest
Array.description: It's a frozen treasure chest.

Array.name: Chapter 1 Bridge Before Restoration
Array.description: It's the Chapter 1 bridge before its restoration.

Array.name: Icy Frost Flower
Array.description: It's an ice plant bristling with chill. I wonder what effects might the red berries have.

Array.name: Aurora Mushroom
Array.description: A mushroom that grew piercing through the cold snow. Someone named it looking at the color of the mushroom.

Array.name: Martyr's Treasure Chest
Array.description: It's a treasure chest of a martyr.

Array.name: Chapter 2 Bridge Before Restoration
Array.description: It's the Chapter 2 bridge before its restoration.

Array.name: Small Gold Flower
Array.description: It's a small flower holding gold.

Array.name: Large Gold Flower
Array.description: It's a large flower holding gold.

Array.name: Low Palm Tree
Array.description: It's a short palm tree. Be careful when you pass underneath!

Array.name: Thorn Bush Treasure Chest
Array.description: It's a thorn bush treasure chest.

Array.name: Chapter 3 Bridge Before Restoration
Array.description: It's the Chapter 3 bridge before its restoration.

Array.name: Golden Fruit
Array.description: It's the fruit of a thorny bush, glistening in golden hues.

Array.name: Pile of Coins
Array.description: There's a pile of coins someone has collected. Could they be ownerless?

Array.name: A ruined guild building
Array.description: A building faded to pale colors.

Array.name: A land where joy sleeps
Array.description: The sound of harmonious laughter feels like a dream.
